nodes.text: Hop-toads were a type of toad. When explaining to the sky-walker Che'ri why some caregivers had to leave the sky-walkers they cared for, the Chiss caregiver Mitth'ali'astov stated it could be because of short-sighted idiots in charge of the process. When Che'ri failed to understand what Mitth'ali'astov meant by short-sighted, the caregiver instead explained that the short-sighted people had the brains of a hop-toad.
Hop-toads were mentioned in the 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, which was written by Timothy Zahn.
